title: Mobile-Based Mathematics Project Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic arithmetic operations and function concepts
context.additional_context: Process for adult learners to complete real-life math projects linked to daily problems in a mobile environment.

learning_goals: Learners can complete three or more projects that solve real-life problems through mathematical modeling using mobile apps.
Learners can utilize learning content provided on various mobile devices (smartphones/tablets) with over 90% accessibility.
Learners can submit mathematical problem-solving strategies acquired during PBL as oral presentations or digital portfolios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
